classes.title: Private Yoga Therapy
classes.subtitle: Personalized program to achieve wellness goal
classes.description: Yoga therapy is for anyone suffering from joint and muscle issues. respiratory troubles, sleeping problems, immune system dysfunction, stress, or mood irregularities.Personalized program to help you achieve your health and wellness goals.

classes.title: Private Yoga Class
classes.subtitle: Improve yoga posture and mobility
classes.description: Each person has unique body joints and constitutions. This class aims to alleviate pain and provide advanced exercises in private sessions to improve posture and enhance mobility.

classes.title: Group Yoga Class
classes.subtitle: Motivational vibes from group class
classes.description: Yoga movement classes offer personal or group guidance for improving bodily and mental wellbeing. I offer beginner and advanced group class, check out my schedule.
